explains: adj. 兴高采烈的；得意洋洋的
v. 使兴奋（elate 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.en: For my part, I feel elated and close to tears.
sentences.cn: 就我而言，我感觉兴高采烈，都快哭出来了。

sentences.en: They were elated at the result.
sentences.cn: 他们对这一结果感到欢欣鼓舞。

sentences.en: I was elated with the thrill of success.
sentences.cn: 我为成功的喜悦所鼓舞。
